questions.question_text: Which application must be activated to enable customers to check in on-line for future appointments?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The Walk-up Experience application is for pre-built support lounges. The application enables your organization to set up a walk-up contact channel to support online and on-site queue check-in.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-service-management/page/product/walk-up-experience/task/activate-walkup-experience.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

choices.A: Knowledge and skills required for agents

Selected Answer: ABCF
From the CSM Fundamentals Customer Support Desk Organizational Structure: 

There are many influencing factors that will help determine the type of customer support desk structure required, these factors can include:

Organizational structure (yours and your customers)
Geographical location (yours and your customers)
Language and cultural differences (yours and your customers)
Time zones (yours and your customers)
Industry sector (your customers)
Knowledge and skills required
Criticality or VIP status of contacts
Number of agents required

questions.question_text: When activating the Customer Service Management Demo Data plugin, which case type is available besides product case?

choices.C: Runs on demand by the System Admin who must set specific weekly schedules and set only those that are priority 1-critical to be deactivated
choices.A: Runs at the end of the month and deactivates all Special Handling notes more than 30 days old
choices.D: Runs daily at midnight, checks all active alerts and sets the status to Expired for those that have reached their expiration dates
choices.B: Runs weekly and must have the Active checkbox unchecked in order for Special Handling notes to be deleted by the end of the week

questions.question_text: What’s the purpose of the Deactivate Special Handling Notes Scheduled Job?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer: D.

Selected Answer: D
Answer: D. Runs daily at midnight, checks all active alerts and sets the status to Expired for those that have reached their expiration dates

Explanation: "The Deactivate Special Handling Notes scheduled job, which runs daily at midnight, checks the dates in the Effective on and Expires on fields for each note."

source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/c_OnScreenAlerts.html#

Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

The Deactivate Special Handling Notes scheduled job, which runs daily at midnight, checks the dates in the Effective on and Expires on fields for each note.
If a special handling note has reached its Effective on date, the scheduled job sets the status of the note to Active.
If a special handling note has reached its Expires on date, the scheduled job sets the status of the note to Expired.

Selected Answer: D
Regarding

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/c_OnScreenAlerts.html#

Selected Answer: D
d is correct
